/*Ram is in a business, where
he buys old scooter, he spends some money on its repair,
then he sells it.
You have to tell whether he was in profit or loss.*/

#include <stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int c,r,s;
	scanf("%d%d%d",&c,&r,&s);
	if (c+r<s)
		printf("PROFIT\n");
	else
		printf("LOSS\n");
	return 0;
}
